1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: wn_title.c Sun 11-19-2000 10:50:14 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | /*---------------------------------------
6    |   WN_TITLE.C
7    | ---------------------------------------*/
8    | 
9    | #include <stdarg.h>
10   | #include <string.h>
11   | #include "window.h"
12   | 
13   | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
14   |    FUNCTION: wn_title()
15   |     PURPOSE: Draw title in topline of the window
16   |      SYNTAX: int wn_title(WINDOW *w, char *format, ...)
17   | DESCRIPTION: The window has to have a border.
18   |              The window used will become the active window.
19   |     RETURNS: TRUE  if all is well,
20   |              FALSE if title is too big to fit on window
21   |              NO_WINDOW if no window opened.
22   |     HISTORY: 910907 V0.1
23   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
24   | int wn_title(WINDOWPTR w, char *format, ...)
25   | {
26   |   va_list arguments;
27   |   char title[80];    /* Title string     */
28   | 
29   | 
30   |   /*---------------------------------------------------
31   |     Check if window opened and if it is the top window
32   |   ----------------------------------------------------*/
33   |   if (!w)
34   |     return(NO_WINDOW);
35   |   if (w != top_window)
36   |     wn_top(w);
37   | 
38   |   /*------------------------------
39   |     Check if window has a border
40   |   -------------------------------*/
41   |   if (w->btype == _NO_BORDER)
42   |     return(NO_WINDOW);
43   | 
44   |   /*--------------------
45   |     va_... housekeeping
46   |   ----------------------*/
47   |   va_start(arguments,format);
48   | 
49   |   /*-------------
50   |     Build string
51   |   ---------------*/
52   |   vsprintf(title,format,arguments);
53   | 
54   |   /*---------------------
55   |     va_... house-keeping
56   |   -----------------------*/
57   |   va_end(arguments);
58   | 
59   |   /*----------------------------------------------------------
60   |     Store the title. If already space allocated for titel in
61   |     the window structure, free this first
62   |   ----------------------------------------------------------*/
63   |   if (w->title)
64   |     free(w->title);
65   |   w->title = strdup(title);
66   | 
67   |   /*-----------------
68   |     Print the title
69   |   ------------------*/
70   |   wn_log("wn_title(%p,%s)\n",w,title);
71   |   wn_border(w,w->btype);
72   |   if (strlen(title) < (w->xsize-2))
73   |   {
74   |     printcenter(w->y1 - 1, w->x1 + (w->xsize >> 1), title);
75   |     return(TRUE);
76   |   }
77   |   else
78   |     return(FALSE);
79   | }
